# Dilawar Khan (officer)

Dilawar Khan is a serving two-star general in the Pakistan Army, currently serving as Director General of Welfare & Rehabilitation Directorate (DG W & R Dte) at GHQ, Rawalpindi.
Career
Khan commissioned in 47 Field Regiment Artillery through 84th PMA Long Course. He was promoted to the rank of Major General from Brigadier in 2019.
He served as General officer commanding Hyderabad. He currently serving as Director General of Welfare & Rehabilitation Directorate (DG W & R Dte) at General Headquarters, Rawalpindi.
He received Hilal-i-Imtiaz from the President of Pakistan Arif Alvi in 2023.
